sentence.Network_en: For 50 million years, the rhinoceros, that unbeautiful but unique beast, has survived.
sentence.Network_cn: 犀牛, 这种虽不美丽但独特的动物, 已存活繁衍了五千万年.

sentence.Network_en: Your clothes conceal much of your beautify, yet they hide not the unbeautiful.
